Posts.Content: Suzzetterm wrote: Hi! I just finished with chemo on june 18, 2013, i started to lose my eyelashes and eyebrows by the end of my treatment. I already have a few eyebrows, and my eyelashes a very very short. How long do i have to wait for my eyelashes to be normal again? Thanks Suzzette Dx 12/7/2012, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIB, 2/14 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Surgery 12/17/2012 Lymph node removal: Right, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Right Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: When will my eyebrows/eyelashes come back? Suzzetterm planetbananas
